title: New: Outfit – Dashing In Passing
body:
Liverpool’s much hyped five piece **Outfit** have a new single in the form of the R’n’B influenced _Dashing In Passing_.

It’s funky, confident and if I’m honest, rather refreshing amongst a stuttering UK music scene failing to find itself in the modern digital age. There’s dream-pop inspirations on this new track, reminiscent of **Twin Shadow**, most notable in the reverb tinged vocals; a track sure to cement their profile as one of 2012’s acts to watch out for. Check out _Dashing In Passing_ below, which features on their upcoming EP _**Another Night’s Dreams Reach Earth Again**_ released April 2012 on [**The Sounds Of Sweet Nothing**](http://thesoundsofsweetnothing.bandcamp.com/track/dashing-in-passing).
